description: Secret Keeper allows you to share your deepest secrets anonymously with other Alexa Owners in a public or private way. You can protect your secret with a password and then share this password with other users, they will have exclusive access to your secret. You can listen public secrets from all the users or private secrets if you have a password for them.
exampleInteractions: Alexa ask Secret Keeper to keep my secret
Alexa ask Secret Keeper to tell me a secret
Alexa tell Secret Keeper my numbers are 800 and 900
name: Secret Keeper
shortDescription: Share your deepest secrets anonymously with other Alexa owners in a public or private way
